import React from 'react' const normalItem = ({data, edit, remove}) => (

{data.name}

{data.description}

{data.rating}/5

) const editableItem = ({data, save}) => (

{data.description}

{data.rating}/5

) const Item = ({ editable, ...props}) => editable ? editableItem(props) : normalItem(props) export default Item
